content: ophrys is a sweet little lace cowl that knits up super quick and is perfect for your favourite sportweight yarn pattern includes details on how to increase both the height and circumference of the cowl pattern has both written and charted instructions **materials ** 170yds / 155m sportweight yarn 3 75mm / us5 16 / 40cm circular needle **finished measurements ** 24 circumference x 8 tall 61 x 20cm *sample shown in knit picks high desert sport shade mountain bluebird*
